tuv.seg: Overview of hospital services
Seirbhísí Ospidéil - Réamhrá
There are three different types of hospital provision in Ireland:
Tá trí chineál éagsúla de sholáthar ospidéil in Éirinn
• Health Service Executive (HSE) hospitals, owned and funded by the HSE
• Ospidéil Fheidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte (FSS), atá faoi úinéireacht FSS agus atá á maoiniú aici
• Voluntary public hospitals, most of whose income comes from State funds
• Ospidéil dheonacha phoiblí, a dtagann an chuid is mó dá n-ioncam ó chistí an Stáit
Voluntary public hospitals are sometimes owned by private bodies, for example, religious orders
I gcásanna áirithe, tá ospidéil dheonacha phoiblí faoi úinéireacht comhlachtaí poiblí, mar shampla, oird rialta
Other voluntary public hospitals are incorporated by charter or statute and are run by boards often appointed by the Minister for Health
Is corpraithe le cairt nó le reacht atá ospidéil dheonacha phoiblí eile, agus iad á reáchtáil ag boird, a gceapann an tAire Sláinte iad go minic
• Private hospitals, which receive no State funding
• Ospidéil phríobháideacha, nach bhfaigheann aon mhaoiniú ón Stát
Public health services are provided in HSE hospitals and public voluntary hospitals and in practice there is very little difference between these two types of hospital
Is in ospidéil FSS agus in ospidéil dheonacha poiblí a chuirtear seirbhísí sláinte poiblí ar fáil. Is beag difríocht idir an dá chineál sin d’ospidéal sa chleachtas
Most of these hospitals also provide private health care but they must clearly distinguish between public and private beds
Cuireann formhór na n-ospidéal sin cúram sláinte príobháideach ar fáil freisin, ach ní mór dóibh idirdhealú soiléir a dhéanamh idir leapacha poiblí agus leapacha príobháideacha
There are a number of purely private hospitals that operate independently of state health services
Is ann do roinnt ospidéal nach gcuireann ach seirbhísí sláinte príobháideacha amháin ar fáil
If you opt for private care in a private hospital, you must pay the full cost of treatment and maintenance
Má roghnaíonn tú chun cúram príobháideach a fháil in ospidéal príobháideach, ní mór duit lánchostas na cóireála agus na cothabhála a íoc
Acute hospital services diagnose, treat and care for seriously ill or injured patients
Diagnóisíonn seirbhísí ospidéil ghéarmhíochaine othair atá an-tinn nó an-ghortaithe, cuireann siad cóireáil orthu agus tugann siad aire orthu
Acute hospital services are provided in HSE hospitals, public voluntary hospitals and private hospitals
Is in ospidéil FSS, in ospidéil dheonacha phoiblí agus in ospidéil phríobháideacha a chuirtear seirbhísí ospidéil ghéarmhíochaine
Some hospitals are specialist, for example, maternity or psychiatric hospitals, while others are general
Is sainospidéil atá in ospidéil áirithe, mar shampla, ospidéil mháithreachais nó ospidéil shíciatracha, agus is ospidéil ghinearálta atá i gcinn eile
The large general and regional hospitals provide a broad range of services
Cuireann na hospidéil ghinearálta mhóra agus réigiúnacha raon leathan seirbhísí ar fáil
Smaller local hospitals may not be able to cater for all illnesses and treatments and you may have to be transferred to a larger hospital or to a specialist hospital
D'fhéadfadh nach mbeadh na hospidéil áitiúla bheaga in ann freastal ar gach cineál galair agus cóireála agus d'fhéadfadh gur ghá tú a aistriú chuig ospidéal níos mó nó chuig sainospidéal
In-patient services are institutional services provided for people in hospitals, convalescent homes or homes for people with physical or mental disabilities
Is é is seirbhísí othair chónaithigh ann ná seirbhísí institiúideacha a chuirtear ar fáil do dhaoine in ospidéil, in ionaid téarnaimh nó in ionaid do dhaoine faoi mhíchumas fisiciúil nó meabhrach
Day-case treatment is regarded as an in-patient service but you do not stay in hospital overnight
Féachtar ar chóireáil cás lae mar sheirbhís othair chónaithigh, ach ní fhanann an t-othar san ospidéal thar oíche
Out-patient services are generally taken to include accident and emergency services as well as planned services provided on an out-patient basis
De ghnáth, glactar leis go n-áirítear le seirbhísí othair sheachtraigh seirbhísí timpistí agus éigeandála, mar aon le seirbhísí pleanáilte a sholáthraítear ar bhonn othar seachtrach

For example, you may be referred by your family doctor (GP) for specialist assessment by a consultant or his or her team or for diagnostic assessments such as x-rays or laboratory tests or for treatment such as physiotherapy

Mar shampla, d’fhéadfadh go ndéanfadh do dhochtúir teaghlaigh (LG) tú a atreorú do shainmheasúnú ag comhairleach nó ag a f(h)oireann, do mheasúnuithe diagnóiseacha ar nós x-ghathanna nó tástálacha saotharlainne nó do chóireáil ar nós fisiteiripe
As a public patient, you do not have to pay for consultants' services and you do not have a choice of consultants
Agus tú i d’othar poiblí, ní gá duit íoc as seirbhísí comhairleach agus ní féidir leat do chomhairleach a roghnú
In many areas, there are waiting lists for non-emergency services
Tá liosta feithimh le haghaidh seirbhísí neamhéigeandála ann i mórán ceantar
Information on waiting times for in-patient treatment is available online
Tá faisnéis ar amanna feithimh le haghaidh cóireáil othair chónaithigh ar fáil ar líne
If you choose to be a private patient in a public hospital, you become the private patient of the consultant treating you and you must pay for all consultant services provided to you

Má roghnaíonn tú chun a bheith i d’othar príobháideach in ospidéal poiblí, caitear leat mar othar príobháideach de chuid an chomhairligh a bhfuil cóireáil á cur aige/aici ort agus ní mór duit íoc as gach ceann de na seirbhísí a chuireann an comhairleach ar fáil duit
There is also a set daily charge for private patients in public hospitals
Tá táille laethúil shocraithe ann i leith othair phríobháideacha in ospidéil phoiblí freisin
Private hospitals are free to set their own charges to patients
Is féidir le hospidéil phríobháideacha a dtáillí féin a shocrú i leith othar
Private health insurance may cover some or all of the costs involved
D’fhéadfadh go ndéanfadh árachas sláinte príobháideach na costais uile atá i gceist, nó cuid díobh, a chlúdach
Deaf and hard of hearing patients are entitled to interpretation services in public hospitals in Ireland
Tá othair atá bodhar nó a bhfuil moill éisteachta orthu i dteideal seirbhísí ateangaireachta in ospidéil phoiblí in Éirinn
You should notify the hospital that you are deaf or hard of hearing in advance of your visit so they can make any necessary arrangements
Ba chóir duit fógra a thabhairt don ospidéal go bhfuil tú bodhar nó go bhfuil moill éisteachta ort roimh an gcuairt chun gur féidir leis na socruithe is gá a dhéanamh
Further information regarding these services is available from the Director of Disability Services at your Local Health Office
Tá tuilleadh faisnéise faoi na seirbhísí sin ar fáil ó Stiúrthóir na Seirbhísí Míchumais ag d’Oifig Áitiúil Sláinte
Public and voluntary hospitals are subject to Freedom of Information legislation
Tá ospidéil phoiblí agus dheonacha faoi réir reachtaíocht Saoráil Faisnéise
This means, among other things, that they are obliged to publish information about their structures, services and practices
Fágann sé sin, i measc nithe eile, go bhfuil dualgas orthu faisnéis a fhoilsiú faoina gcuid struchtúr, seirbhísí agus cleachtas
If the hospital holds personal information about you, you can access those records
Má tá faisnéis fút á coinneáil ag an ospidéal, tá tú i dteideal teacht ar na taifid sin
See our document on hospital charges for details of the charges that may apply and who is exempt from charges
Féach ár gcáipéis maidir le táillí ospidéil le haghaidh sonraí faoi na táillí a d’fhéadfadh bheith ann agus faoi cé atá díolmhaithe ó tháillí
You should obtain a letter of referral from your GP if you need to receive hospital treatment
Ba chóir duit litir atreoraithe a fháil ó do LG má theastaíonn cóireáil ospidéil uait
You can attend accident and emergency departments in most general hospitals and some specialist hospitals without a letter of referral but you may be charged for your visit

Is féidir leat freastal ar rannóga timpistí agus éigeandála i bhformhór na n-ospidéal ginearálta agus i roinnt sainospidéal gan litir atreoraithe a bheith agat, agus d’fhéadfadh go ngearrfaí táille ort i leith do chuairte
View contact information for public hospitals in your area
Féach an fhaisnéis teagmhála d’ospidéil phoiblí i do cheantar
